channel.title: Hows this? + Tool Include Details
channel.description:
Well...I used: Render x4 Dodge Tool Include Brushes Text Rotating Using Fills Saturation Blending options -=- Only to hide the outlines of the render I used.
I dont know what else I used, but my mom gave me ideas of where to put the cut render :P,then when I put "Slash Killer" she left the room and said it looked terrible with that name on it lol, but I didnt know 49 year olds still had good imaginations...>.>
[IMG]http://i17.tinypic.com/33pcyzo.png[/img]
[u][b]-=-Special Thx to-=-[/b][/u] exe626 -=- Giving me support on my thread I posted; Mr.Chris -=- Pointing out good things for me to use; My Mom -=- For telling me were to put render.(lol kinda funny if you read above my pic...rofl).

Oh well…Just gonna continue and ignore people that rate me bad from now on :|…

item.dc:creator: @Greek_Line Greek Line
item.description:
@Greek_Line wrote:

Well I dont get it with you…I’ve done much better and I’ve gotten rating close to the one you just gave me all the time :(…>.> Whats up with that?

@kaza wrote:

I’m not complaining, i’m just being honest and giving constructive critism.

item.title: Hows this? + Tool Include Details
item.dc:creator: @Greek_Line Greek Line
item.description:
@Greek_Line wrote:

[quote=“Kaza, post:2, topic:82215”]Better than your others, although it is still a little dark, when your setting on overlay or whatever to get rid of the outline on the render, erase around the main points of the render.

A little plain…

6/10, better than most of your others, read some tutorials though.[/quote]
:(…I’m starting to think you hate what I do, because every sig I make you complain about it :mad:

[quote=“goatee, post:3, topic:82215”]Why tool include details?

Signatures okay. The background could be better.[/quote]
Yeh…I looked at a abstract TuT and use brushes for them as my imagination…>.>. I’m about to upload a new Image soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Hows this? + Tool Include Details
item.dc:creator: @Greek_Line Greek Line
item.description:
@Greek_Line wrote:

Well…I used:
Render x4
Dodge Tool Include
Brushes
Text Rotating
Using Fills
Saturation
Blending options -=- Only to hide the outlines of the render I used.

I dont know what else I used, but my mom gave me ideas of where to put the cut render :P,then when I put “Slash Killer” she left the room and said it looked terrible with that name on it lol, but I didnt know 49 year olds still had good imaginations…>.>
